name: Sunflower Snap!
description:
Controls:

Mouse:

Left-Click -- Grab item. (Seed, Shovel, Watering Can, Watch)

Right-Click -- Toss/Activate Item (While holding an Item)

ESC -- Pause/Play

Gamepad:

(Xbox buttons shown but should work with other gamepads)

X -- Grab Item.

A -- Toss/Activate Item

Menu -- Pause/Play
